page.title: 20TRANSPORT MOTORWAY AT LUTON
page.content: On Tuesday June 25 at 2.pm a group of children stood on the foot bridge near Foxdell Junior School to count the cars on the motorway. The nearest junction for cars to get on to and off the motorway is at Dunstable Road. The motorway goes from London to Leeds. For 10 minutes from 2.05 to 2.15 they counted the cars, there were 185 going north and 159 going south. The motorway might have been quieter than usual because of the roadworks at junction 8. These were major works and were expected to cause congestion, so many people may have found another route. Pedestrians and learners are not allowedon the motorway and the speed limit is 70mph. The schools which have produced these pages of information are Downside Jnr., St.Mary's Lower, and Rotheram High.
